sections.source:
## Welcome!

Gistbook is a place where you can write short entries about programming, math, and other technical subjects. Each book is made up of a series of blocks.

Text blocks, like the one you're reading now, support [Github-flavored Markdown](https://help.github.com/articles/github-flavored-markdown/) and [LaTeX](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LaTeX), so you can **format text** and write equations such as \(x = 3 + 5\). It also supports display math, as in

$$\int_a^b{x^2\mathrm{d}x}$$

And, of course, no Gistbook would be complete without Emoji. :+1:

In addition to text, you can write code, too. Gistbook supports `html`, `css`, and `javascript`.
Start making Gistbooks today!

// This code will execute when you hit Run
console.log('You just ran this Gistbook');
You can even require in Node modules.

To see this Gistbook in action, compile it by clicking the **run** button below :point_down:
